website_summaries.verdict: If you have drilling applications that require this type of tool, it's a good option. Otherwise, consider others on our shortlist.
pros: A ruggedly made, professional-grade tool with a reliable motor and exceptional torque
Spade handle makes jobs like floor drilling and mixing easy
cons: It's the most expensive and heaviest model we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: Out of the Box and it's Smoking.
customer_reviews.text: I only had the opportunity to use this drill 2 days ago. Fresh out of the Box, and it not only did not spin when I pulled the trigger, it started to smoke. And just now, I noticed the Return Window just closed on me yesterday, October 18. So I guess they knew this was a piece of expensive Crap!
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Mixing mortar can be difficult. Especially for small projects. I tried using a standard drill and it did NOT end well. Yes, I got more mortar on my clothes than anything else!! So, I decided to use a fork...and it worked pretty well. But took a very, VERY long time. I did not like being a mortar forker. There HAD to be a better way!! And BEHOLD! Dewalt has a solution to my mortar forking problem. This is an awesome drill. I would definitely recommend buying this to help all your mortar needs.
customer_reviews.author: Hubcap

customer_reviews.title: Drill through R/R ties.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has so much power. Used to drill 1/2 innch auger through railroad ties and it made my job easy as can be. Also have used it to mix paint, mix grout and morter ect. BUY IT you wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Very good drill from a good company
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described and it came in on time. I am replacing a Craftsman 1/2 drill my father gave me and that I have had for 40 years. My hope is that this new one is as good. Time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Ted J. Rikard

customer_reviews.title: Top notch mud-mixing drill
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Mixed almost 4000lbs of concrete with an eggbeater on this guy in 1 day. It was a little warm, and I was a little jittery myself, but the job was done successfully. Only on the last bag of concrete did the chuck finally loosen up enough to let the bit out, but whatever, after 90 or so minutes of mixing, I was a lot looser then, too. Great drill.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt DW130V 1/2 inch spade handle drill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace two name brands I'd burnt out. One of the jobs for this drill is mixing 40 lb. batches of dry wall mud. Due to the low RPM, its easy on operator, drill, and you don't get mud all over. Also use it for long ship builder's bits to drill 3/4" plus holes through wood like railroad ties. Again, the low speed & high torque make this job easy. This drill is for anyone who really uses their tools, especially on projects that need torque, and don't want to keep replacing them every few years.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Lover

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull, serious drill
customer_reviews.text: Used this so far to drive 6" structural screws, and to mix bags of Quikcrete concrete refinishing cement. This drill has the required torque for mixing thick materials in a bucket, a process that caused my other regular heavy duty drills to smoke and fail.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: I use this drill to drive my Trailer Valet 5X to spin my 24' RV and then back it into its parking spot. I have a Makita corded 1/2" drill that literally smokes during this task, but the DeWalt handles the job with ease. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great drill for this concrete mixing newbie
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this to use for mixing cement / concrete mix in buckets. This drill is quite powerful and handled cement mix easily. Using this with a mixing paddle, the concrete mixing work was very neat (not messy at all). I didn't get splatter either over the bucket. Very happy I bought this and I highly recommend it. I do wish it came with some sort of case but that's a minor point.
customer_reviews.author: PSo

customer_reviews.title: Pop Up Camper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to raise my pop-up camper. Works like a dream. My regular drill and my heavy duty hammer drill wouldn’t raise it much more than an inch. Low speed and high torque wins the game. I have mixed some mortar also. Worked perfect for that also
customer_reviews.author: Donald White

customer_reviews.title: reliable, light but strong
customer_reviews.text: great strong and reliable drill for mixing mud and light concrete. I only use around the house and rental for light work--probably last a lifetime. I've used standard drills untill burn out. this one worked without a hiccup. not a drill you will use everyday but a drill that you'll be happy with when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald d Pawlak

customer_reviews.title: This drill is perfect, I've used it to mix mud
customer_reviews.text: I'm remodeling my bathroom and purchased this mixer because my normal drill was starting to smell burned, it wasn't designed for that heavy duty use. This drill is perfect, I've used it to mix mud, compound, thinset and some self leveling concrete. The hardest thing to mix was the mud to put under the bathtub (for support) and this drill handled it without any issues. Dewalt makes good tools, this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: spY_

customer_reviews.title: Torque monster! Eat through wood like nothing.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to drill 3/4 to 1 inch holes up to 12 inches through treated wood posts to hang gates on. This drill is a monster! It will take a dull bit right through the posts. Not it's not light weight, or easy to use, but I don't care. If you have to have torque this drill has it! Also I run this off a 2000 volt power inverter off my truck with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: v650

customer_reviews.title: Great drill, wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Drill looks and works great. My Only complaint is that the safety bolt that came with it used to attach the spade handle to the top of the drill does not fit. So I can’t attach the spade handle. The part that came with it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best mixing drill ever.
customer_reviews.text: After trying different drills for the last 42 years, I have found these to work the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bobjr

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great for heavy duty mixing of cement and concrete. We use it on job sites on a daily basis and have never had an issue
customer_reviews.author: B8B8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mixing Mixing Mortar and Concrete
customer_reviews.text: This was the best $100 I have ever spent. After numerous small masonry jobs in which I was mixing in a wheelbarrow, I decided to buy a mixing drill. I could not be happier with this drill. Plenty of power to mix both mortar mix and pre-mix concrete in buckets, where you just add water. Saves so much time and much easier on the shoulders. Highly recommended from a mason that does small projects for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: TheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this drill thinking it would last at least a job mixing mud. Boy was I wrong, this thing works great. Never heated up nor bogged down. As an amature I do not use this much and I thought that it was going to be overkill. I love the fact that I do not have to replace in the middle of a job as I did with cheaper drills of the samw size. I don't plan on burning it out but if I lose it, I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Used it to mix mud for tile worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: Mixing mud for tile flooring works like a dream burned out two other drills weren’t made for mixing and now I know why... love this drill
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe D Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent electric drill
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent electric drill. It has lots of power and can easily handle thick mortar mixes without any trouble. It is also versatile by allowing the side handle to be put in any position around the drill at 90 degree intervals which is great for your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Gene P. Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to mix mortar and concrete, and it is great. Powerful. So powerful that if you become inattentive, it can wrench your arm. It is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: I love this drill
customer_reviews.text: This drill was bought to replace a drill stolen by dirtbags. I love this drill. It mixes stiff drywall mud easily. I haven't used it for anything else but I can tell from experience that it has plenty of power for most tasks. It's a very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: scary
customer_reviews.text: It is scary how much power it has it replaced an old (like 1950's) one that turned 330 rpm and this one has twice as much power actually untwisted an auger bit...
customer_reviews.author: Chase Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill for Whipping
customer_reviews.text: I use this drill nearly daily for mixing Bond Kote, thin-set, grout, mortar, and the like. I love it. It is strong, with exceptional low-rpm power. I use it for nothing but whipping, so I can't attest to how it performs otherwise. Once I tightened the chuck, the whip has stayed in place since without requiring re-tightening. I'm very pleased with my Dewalt drill.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drill to mix mud and thinset and it does awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: This drill is a heavy duty model designed for applications that are too tough for battery operated models and most other corded drills. I have used mine for drilling into railroad ties, landscape timbers and support posts while building retaining walls, decks and patios. I have also used it for auguring 3"x12" holes for planting bulbs in my flower beds. It has never once overheated or failed to perform, and the price offered by this vendor made it an outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Drywall mud in 5 gallon bucket don't have a chance with this beast ! Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tuff Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this bad boy, its strong enough for tuff jobs!
customer_reviews.author: Gary James

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great! I have used it for a few other ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do tenon cutting and drilling holes in lodgepole for tenons to fit it. This thing works great! I have used it for a few other projects also. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Mixed ton's of drywall.
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. It's the perfect speed and torque for mixing drywall mud. Just don't let it get rained on. It still works but its louder now. I've seen guys with some fancy pants drills at work and I always prefer mine.
customer_reviews.author: Aj Hodges

customer_reviews.title: It's great. Using it with an auger bit for drilling ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Using it with an auger bit for drilling holes in tree stumps.

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy-duty drill
customer_reviews.text: This drill works great for mixing thin set mortar. Im sure its great for other stuff but thats the primary area of use I have for it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell B

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: Work Horse. Mixed Dozens of buckets of mortar with no hesitation. Seems like it will stand the test of time too. Good quality, as expected from DeWalt
customer_reviews.author: Golfer27

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty mixer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily as a low speed mixer but have since used it for drilling 3/4" holes through dock pilings. This thing runs a 3/4 auger bit with no trouble. Real workhorse.
customer_reviews.author: Krum

customer_reviews.title: This drill is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This drill is a beast, I use it to mix thinset for commercial tile laying it is the sh*t!
customer_reviews.author: Ben b.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and made my job planting hundreds of spring bulbs a snap
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: good drill
customer_reviews.text: when i became tile setter several years ago,there are no many brand drill used in mixing thinset mortar,dewalt is one.i like the durability this drill,so do many other tile setters.
customer_reviews.author: qi liu

customer_reviews.title: quality high torque nice size unit
customer_reviews.text: Had an old craftsman that the reduction gears striped-parts not available anymore ! This thing is stronger and a little smaller. plenty handels and positions for them when that thing torques.
customer_reviews.author: david d

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for drywall mud, has way more power than anything else out there, nice tool
customer_reviews.author: Bobbers

customer_reviews.title: great for my job Am tile GUY in MA
customer_reviews.text: really strong and powerfull, drill, for grout, thinset, and much more great for everything, and much more, i would reccomend to friend
customer_reviews.author: YoullPay

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to mix mortar. The power and comfort of this product made it much easier for me to do the job without getting exhausted. One of the best products I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: John, E

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 1/2 inch drill driver
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy piece of equipment and really gets the job done. Horizontal use is difficult, but can be effective with a little muscle power.
customer_reviews.author: Sue E. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't have waited so long
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a tank! Since purchasing it I've mixed up a lot of mortar and mud and it's been a dream to use. I can't believe I waited so long to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: pretty good drill
customer_reviews.text: pretty good drill, but won't do the holes I had hoped(1 1/2" augers through 8" timbers). great for the money, though
customer_reviews.author: Kirby W. Gaal

customer_reviews.title: We had one just like it before
customer_reviews.text: We had one just like it before, and got many years of service . We use the mixer for mixing thinset daily.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Yecoshenko

customer_reviews.title: Great for mixing thin set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for mixing thin set. I nearly burned up my cordless. Good price, very powerful. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert Smellfungus

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Power
customer_reviews.text: Whether you mixing a little grout or a 50 lb. bag of floor mud this mixer has you covered. You need strong feet to hold onto the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: cmbholstein

customer_reviews.title: Another great Dewalt tool
customer_reviews.text: Great, does what you'd expect. Feels really solid and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Drill
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good drill & does exactly what I expect of a drill. It is heavy, but if you want it to be heavy duty, that is required. I do like the spade handle, it gives you a good grip on it even if the weather is hot.
customer_reviews.author: gypsydog

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful yet easy to control the speed with the variable trigger and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful yet easy to control the speed with the variable trigger and slow start. No more puff of mortar dust in your face when you start mixing a bucket mud.
customer_reviews.author: vishal

customer_reviews.title: Solid mud mixer
customer_reviews.text: Dad finally asked for his back. So I got one just like it. Between the two of us, we used his dewalt to mix the light concrete, thinset, and grout for 1 basement, 1 shower pan, 6 bathrooms, 2 utility rooms. Very solid chuck. They improved (IMHO) the plug style between his and mine. Mine has a "regular" sized plug that allows me to have multiple tools to plug into my 3 plug extension cord. His had this chunky round plug.
customer_reviews.author: SFP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It held up under strenuous mixing without overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Man

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this drill to mix the lime putty for my strawbale house. It performed wonderfully. The slow rotation of the bit was not a problem. It gave me the control I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Jordan

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY
customer_reviews.text: This drill works great for mixing mud , grout , and also as a regular drill. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Theodore J Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price for this drill had one before and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for this drill had one before and it's a workhorse. Would recommend to anyone that has to mix a whole bunch of motar....
customer_reviews.author: Marieta Momii

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Very good and powerful tool. I went trough a maple log with a 1 1/4 inch auger drill without any problem. I just wist it came with a case for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas lï¿½veillï¿½

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of torque to mix any consistency of mortar, ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of torque to mix any consistency of mortar, having mixed hundreds of buckets so far, you buy this one and you'll never have to buy another one again
customer_reviews.author: Larry Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mixer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for dedicated mixer. Lots of power but low torque makes it an easy to control workhorse. If you do a lot of tile or anything that requires a lot of mixing, do yourself a favor and invest in this mixer.
customer_reviews.author: brandon fenninger

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. It was on the top of his birthday wish list. Great price and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great drill works just as expected arrived on time very happy with it and recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: charles bertzfield

customer_reviews.title: the best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mixing a bag if thin set burned up my last drill...this one...not even a sweat....!!! Solid piece of quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, Higly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, strong tool that should last me a life time. Higly recommended. Do not waste your money on the Porter Cable. I was alway a big fan of their tools, but they have cheapened them. On first use drilling a 1.5" hole in a pine 2 x 12, the gears stripped. Sintered metal gears fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: David Mason

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This mixes thin set mortar and normal mortar like a dream, worth the price. I believe the right tool for the right job
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Ristine

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I use it mostly to mix tile mortar. Works great
customer_reviews.author: GKS

customer_reviews.title: Addictive Builders LLC
customer_reviews.text: I own two drills like this one. Great for mixing drywall mud. It was a great buy for where I live.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perect for mixing thinset and grout.
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased this drill sooner. It has plenty of torque and is lighter than I thought it would be. It's perfect for mixing thinset and grout.
customer_reviews.author: davdb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drill
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy duty drill. An excellent value in a very durable tool. I have been very happy with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Edgmon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best drill out there for mixing mud hands down. Heavy duty and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dillinger Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed to get the job done right. It works perfectly for mixing drywall mud for us.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA

customer_reviews.title: Works great for high torque needs
customer_reviews.text: Using this for mixing mud and while it does a fine job at the worksite, it also seconds to power my Wondermill Jr to grind wheat on the first pass. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burnthorn

customer_reviews.title: good price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am always pleased with price and quality of this brand,it is very tough and powerful and and backed for a good warranty
customer_reviews.author: Armando Martinez

customer_reviews.title: solid! price is great
customer_reviews.text: We are making slip for our straw bale house, needed something that would mix well and not cost a fortune. It may not last for years but the price wae great and it is very solid. I like the variable speeds, although that may make it less durable. I have mixed some light concrete with it qnd it performed well. Not sure how it would do with heavier stuff as it may be under powered but it works great for my purposes and saved about$150 Over fancier models
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Lover

customer_reviews.title: Spins a little faster at full throttle than I would ...
customer_reviews.text: Spins a little faster at full throttle than I would prefer. Seems a little "lightweight" , hopefully it will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW 130V DRILL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drill to mix thinset after burning up an older half inch drill. The DEWALT 130 works great. I have no problem mixing a full bag of thinset with this drill. It was a great drill at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Dealt driLl
customer_reviews.text: Easy transaction! Great buy! Husband was very pleased with the drill and has uses it almost every day a work. Would buy from this site again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ok drill but not great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use with our WonderMill Jr. grain mill, it works but it takes several passes and still over heats the drill. I haven't used it yet for other drilling purposes. Variable hand grips are nice.
customer_reviews.author: ECB

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, decent build quality, but doesn't feel quite as solid as the old solid-metal Black and Decker that it replaced. I doubt it will last 40 years but it seems rugged enough for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: John Keith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality made and works great as all DeWalt tools do
customer_reviews.author: Chad Melerine

customer_reviews.title: Good drill
customer_reviews.text: Good drill I got it for mixing drywall mud works good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DEWALT Electric Drill, Spade Handle, 1/2-Inch, 9-Amp (DW130V),yellow/black,Large
product_meta.description:
The DW130V 9 amp 1/2-inch drill with 
removable spade handle (view larger). Built for rugged applications where high torque is required, the DEWALT DW130V 9 amp 1/2-inch drill with spade handle is ideal for drilling applications that require downward pressure. Additionally, the three-position side and two-position rear handles are adjustable so you can move them to ensure proper leverage. The DW130V produces up to 550 RPM of torque to efficiently meet the needs of a wide variety of applications, including drilling and mixing paint and drywall mud.

The DW130V can handle:

 * Spade bit drilling in wood up to 1-1/2 inches
 * Self-feed bit drilling in wood up to 2 9/16 inches
 * Hole saw drilling in wood up to 5 inches
 * Auger bit drilling in wood up to 1-1/2 inches
 * Twist bit drilling in steel up to 1/2 inch
 * Hole saw drilling in steel up to 3 inches

Thanks to its variable speed reversible switch, air bubbles are reduced when mixing mud and you'll enjoy greater control when drilling. It also offers a soft grip handle for increased comfort.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
DW130V 9 amp 1/2-inch drill; spade handle; side handle; chuck key with holder; operating instructions

DW130V 9 AMP 1/2-INCH DRILL
AT A GLANCE
 * 9.0 amp, 120 volt motor provides enough power for any job site 
 * Rear spade and side handles provide greater control for all drilling and mixing applications
 * Variable speed reversible switch reduces air bubbles when mixing mud 
 * Soft grip handle provides superior comfort and ergonomics

KEY SPECIFICATIONS
Amps 9.0 amps No Load Speed 0 to 550 rpm Max Watts Out 600 watts Clutch No Chuck Size 1/2-inch Gear Reduction Triple Tool Weight 7.5 pounds ABOUT DEWALT
DEWALT is a leading manufacturer of industrial power tools and accessories, including corded and cordless drills, saws, hammers, grinders, routers, planers, plate joiners, sanders, lasers, generators, compressors, nailers, saw blades, metal and masonry drill bits, abrasives, screw driving accessories and more. DEWALT tools can be found nationally and internationally wherever tools are sold. With more than 1,000 factory-owned and authorized locations, DEWALT has one of the most extensive service and repair networks in North America.

Two-position rear spade handle for greater control (view larger). 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
DEWALT DW130V Heavy-Duty 9 Amp 1/2-Inch Drill with Spade Handle
feature_bullets: Variable speed reversing switch avoids air bubbles when mixing mud and offers greater control when drilling
0 - 550 RPM provides increased torque for drilling and mud mixing
9 Amp, 120V motor provides enough power for any job site application
7.5 lbs. (3.4 kg) increases user productivity and decreases user fatigue
Soft grip handle provides superior comfort and ergonomics

specifications.Included Components: Includes 3-position side handle, chuck key and holder, 2-position rear handle
specifications.Warranty Description: 90-day money back, 1-year free service contract, 3-year limited warranty
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars241 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
